text: You Can't Win 'Em All is a 1970 American British war adventure movie directed by Peter Collinston and starring Tony Curtis, Charles Bronson, Michèle Mercier, Grégoire Aslan, Fikret Hakan, Patrick Magee, Tony Bonner, Patrick O'Connell and Leo Gordon. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * You Can't Win 'Em All at the TCM Movie Database Category:1970 war movies Category:1970 adventure movies Category:British war movies Category:British adventure movies Category:American war movies Category:1970s American adventure movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Collinson Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:Movies set in Turkey Category:Movies set in Istanbul Category:British comedy movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:Buddy action movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:Adventure comedy movies Category:British buddy movies Category:1970s American action movies
title: You Can't Win 'Em All
